sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: Major programs in kdesdk include cervisia, kbabel, kcachegrind, kompare and umbrello.

sect3.title: cervisia
sect3.para: cervisia provides a graphical view of CVS.

sect3.title: kbabel
sect3.para: kbabel is a suite of an advanced PO file editor comprising kbabel, a multi functional catalogmanager and a dictionary for translators kbabeldict.

sect3.title: kcachegrind
sect3.para: kcachegrind is a KDE frontend for cachegrind, part of Valgrind.

sect3.title: kompare
sect3.para: kompare is a program to view the differences between files.

sect3.title: umbrello
sect3.para: umbrello is a UML modelling diagram tool.
